meaningInfo: Imagine your super comfy, state-of-the-art stool. You take it everywhere with you, and you're always sitting on it. Again, and again, and <kanji>again</kanji>. You love that stool.
readingMnemonic: Your friends are starting to worry about you, because you're always sitting on that stool. "What is the <reading>matter</reading> (<ja>また</ja>) with you?" they scream! You might want to imagine that all your friends have Jamaican and/or British accents to make this one fit a bit better!
readingInfo: Imagine your friends getting more and more annoyed with your constant stool-sitting habits! They really don't get it. What is the matter with you?! Why can't you just stand like everyone else? Don't you know sitting is the "new smoking"!?
